AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: court that may accept guilty plea and enter final judgment, explained the range of punishment to Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa, adopted Report and Recommendation, considered character letters from Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa's family members
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Sentencing Commission: issuer of the Guidelines Manual consulted in determining sentence, used for calculating criminal history points and applying applicable guidelines, considered in downward variance request
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Probation Office: office that received the defendant's statement and prepared the PSR report documenting his background, responded to objections, disagreed with certain calculations regarding Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa's case, provided Supplemental Addendum
